Title: The Marketing Plan
Short Intro: Create your own Marketing Plan for your  own product or service idea.  In this course you will learn how to produce arguably the most important marketing tool for any business.  Rather than simply learning the stages of The Marketing Plan, you will be asked each week to complete a peer graded assignment which will help you complete a simplified version of the plan.  You will be required either to map the four crucial stages for your own product or service idea or use the Nissan Leaf case study (attached in the additional readings) in order to produce a professional example.
